document.full_text: fewer than 100 al qaeda members remain inside afghanistan, but they form a core group providing the afghan taliban with resources and technical battlefield skills, the second most senior u.s. commander in the country said monday.
document.title: al qaeda "cadres" still help afghan taliban: u.s.
lines_and_colors: fewer than 100 al qaeda members remain inside afghanistan, but they form a core group providing the afghan taliban with resources and technical battlefield skills, the second most senior u.s. commander in the country said monday.
